705917f-a.title: Brooklyn: Nelson Street - Hicks Street
705917f-a.text:
Nelson Street, at the southwest corner of Hicks Street, showing
Public School No. 27, erected in 1890.
Board of ducation of the Uity of New York September 4, 1930
705917f-a.folder: Nelson Street & Hicks Street, Brooklyn, NY

705918f-a.title: Brooklyn: Nelson Street - Hicks Street
705918f-a.text:
(1)
Nelson Street, at the S. W. corner of Hicks Street, showing Public School No. 27. The view is from Hcks Street (right), at Huntington Street and shows the east side and rear of the school across an empty lot, where
formerly stood several frame houses.
June 25, 1931
P. L. Sperr
(2)
The same, at a 1ater date.
August 5, 1934
P. L. Sperr
705918f-a.folder: Nelson Street & Hicks Street, Brooklyn, NY
